- Slippy might be a girl, it's a frog,
it's that there's no difference.
But Peppy is the old rabbit.
- Yeah, Peppy's a guy, Falco is a guy,
Fox is a guy, Slippy is a girl.
- Slippy definitely has a girlish attitude.
I don't know that I would necessarily call him a girl.
Crystal, on the other hand, from Star Fox Adventures,
is foin.
- Yeah, well she had boobs, I think.
- She seriously had some boobs on her, yeah.
Yeah, yeah, and when I was a kid.
- Yeah, they also, like, they tried to discourage you
from having sex with her in two ways,
which is one, she's a fox,
but then number two, they made her blue.
- Right.
- And I still was just, I was beating it raw to Crystal.
- I think you might've been a furry when you were a kid.
- Man, these Kamala Harris pictures are just fucking insane.
She just looked so different.
- All right, Rex, tell them about your new project.
Link to your new project.
This camera, that camera, go ahead.
- What new project?
I don't know what you're talking about.
- Go ahead.
- I don't have any new projects.
There's no new projects.
- Admit it.
- There's no new projects.
- I'll admit to your new project.
- I don't have any new projects.
- Admit to your new project.
Okay, so what were you bragging about?
- Rex is gonna start in the new,
the reboot to Pranked with,
it's gonna be Pranked with Rex.
That's what it's gonna be called.
- Are you thinking about Punked?
- Fuck.
(laughs)
Thinking about something, really?
[laughter]
Yeah, we'll end it there.
